name: LogicInsight - Nutanix Cluster Disk Failure Monitor
message:
{{#is_alert}}

Alert status: One or more disks in the cluster are in a failed state.

This condition can compromise cluster resiliency and data protection mechanisms. Immediate attention is required.

Recommended actions:

1. Log in to Prism and identify the failed disk(s) under Hardware > Disks.
2. Validate whether the disk failure is transient (e.g., connectivity) or permanent.
3. If the failure is confirmed, replace the disk following Nutanix hardware replacement procedures.
4. Monitor the Curator and Cassandra tasks to ensure data rebalancing is progressing correctly.
5. If multiple disks are impacted, assess the risk to redundancy and consider escalating to Nutanix Support.

{{/is_alert}}

{{#is_recovery}}
Recovery notice: All disks in cluster {{cluster_name}} are now in a healthy state.
The cluster resiliency is back to normal. Great job on the quick recovery!
{{/is_recovery}}
